education.university_name: the University of British Columbia, Vancouver Campus

1.name: Sword Ship
1.desc: A game developed using the Unity engine by a team of four. In its current stage, it is a double player game that simulates a space-like environment in which players face various hazards and fight with each other using weapons. It was showcased at the Vancouver Comic Art Festival, 2017.

2.name: UBC Pair Insights query engine
2.desc: RESTful web application that takes in database queries from the user for accessing UBC course and classroom information. Various operations can be performed on the data by the user through queries.

3.name: DNS resolver
3.desc: Terminal application that takes in a FQDN and provides information about all the name servers and their IP addresses under the FQDN.

4.name: Simple email servers
4.desc: SMTP and POP3 servers that work together to provide a simple email service to users

5.name: Dictionary
5.desc: Client-server application that looks up word meanings on a dict.org server using TCP sockets.

6.name: BusesRUs
6.desc: An android application that links to the TransLink API and provides live bus information. It also shows various bus routes, bus stops and the closest bus stop to the user on a map (Google maps API).

1.title: Software development intern
1.desc: Spent 2 months interning at Source Dot Com. Worked with a team of engineers on an encrypted messaging system for a branch of the Indian Army. Also provided my help to a team involved in building an application in C# that helps a user interact with a fingerprint scanner.

2.title: Cashier
2.desc: Cashiering, along with multiple other tasks such as restocking and customer services.

3.title: Pizzaiolo
3.desc: At this job, I get to hone my cooking skills. I am a very passionate cook.

rel_courses: Introduction to Programming using Python (MIT MOOC)
Introduction to Data Structures and Algorithms

1.title: UBC AGDA
1.desc: Part of UBCâ€™s AMS Game Development Association. We meet every few days for various workshops, game jams and to work on our games.

2.title: UBC BizTech
2.desc: Part of the UBC BizTech community that hosts special events related to tech and the business world. Acclaimed achievers in these fields are brought to the university campus to talk to us about active areas of interest in their respective fields.

1.title: UBC Outstanding International Student Award
1.desc: Won a scholarship of $6,000 for academic performance and numerous other activities.

2.title: My World in a Blog
2.desc: I currently maintain a website where I blog about my travel and life experiences.
